response.overview: A police constable intercepts a car driven by a woman at speed and discovers that she is the actress Seham Shukri, whom he admires. She took him to her house and had sex with him under the influence of drugs. Then she denied knowing him, and when he learned that she was pregnant, he wanted to file a case demanding that she keep the baby, so she agreed to marry him to avoid scandal
response.title: Awwal Marrah Tehibb ya Qalbi
